description: The measure would have made businesses financially and legally liable for human rights violations.
title: Swiss vote to reject Responsible Business Initiative
title_page: Swiss vote to reject Responsible Business Initiative - BBC News
maintext: Business leaders may be heaving a sigh of relief for now - but the fact that this vote was so close with around half of all voters saying yes, is a clear sign to Switzerland's multinationals that the days of avoiding scrutiny are well and truly over.
